definition: to give up life for righteousness (idiom, from Mencius); to choose honor over life/would rather sacrifice one's life than one's principles
to give up/to abandon/to give alms
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: This is not uncommon in ancient style, just take care of Health of the people everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 古代這種風格並不少見，捨生取義之人比比皆是。
